title: Armor of Retribution

The **Armor of Retribution** is an [artifact](/wiki/Artifact "Artifact") [armor](/wiki/Armor "Armor") that appears in [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"). It is [unaligned](/wiki/Unaligned "Unaligned") and [intelligent](/wiki/Intelligent_artifact "Intelligent artifact"), and its [base item](/wiki/Base_item "Base item") is a set of [crystal plate mail](/wiki/Crystal_plate_mail "Crystal plate mail").

## Generation

The Armor of Retribution can only be created by combining [The Sword of Annihilation](/wiki/The_Sword_of_Annihilation "The Sword of Annihilation") and [Ashmar](/wiki/Ashmar "Ashmar") at a [forge](/wiki/Forge_\(dungeon_feature\) "Forge (dungeon feature)"); it cannot be wished for, and will revert to its base item if left in a [bones](/wiki/Bones "Bones") file.

## Description

While carried, The Armor of Retribution grants [acid resistance](/wiki/Acid_resistance "Acid resistance"), and is fully indestructible like The Sword of Annihilation; this includes falling off if a character [polymorphs](/wiki/Polymorph "Polymorph") into a large [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") while wearing it, rather than being destroyed like other body armor. While worn, the Armor of Retribution grants [disintegration resistance](/wiki/Disintegration_resistance "Disintegration resistance"), extrinsic [protection](/wiki/Protection "Protection"), [half physical damage](/wiki/Half_physical_damage "Half physical damage"), [half spell damage](/wiki/Half_spell_damage "Half spell damage"), increases current [carrying capacity](/wiki/Carrying_capacity "Carrying capacity") by 200 [aum](/wiki/Aum "Aum") and maximum carrying capacity by 500 aum, and has a 1⁄7 chance of knocking back monsters that attack the wearer in melee.

The Armor of Retribution cannot be made into [dragon-scaled armor](/wiki/Dragon-scaled_armor "Dragon-scaled armor") using worn [dragon scales](/wiki/Dragon_scales "Dragon scales").

## Encyclopedia entry

Legend tells of a suit of armor that protects the one that  
wears it like no other. So intent in its mission to safeguard  
its master, it will actively attack those that try to harm it.

Armor of Retribution

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
[   Armor of Retribution  
Base item crystal plate mail
Affiliation
  • intelligent artifacts
  • forged artifacts
When carried
  • acid resistance
  • indestructible
When worn
  • disintegration resistance
  • extrinsic protection (+1 to MC up to MC3)
  • half physical damage
  • half spell damage
  • 1⁄7 chance of knockback
  • +200 to current carrying capacity
  • +500 to maximum carrying capacity
  • cannot have dragon scales melded
When invoked none
Base price 60000 zm
Weight 150

The Armor of Retribution is an artifact armor that appears in EvilHack. It is unaligned and intelligent, and its base item is a set of crystal plate mail.

Generation

The Armor of Retribution can only be created by combining The Sword of Annihilation and Ashmar at a forge; it cannot be wished for, and will revert to its base item if left in a bones file.

Description

While carried, The Armor of Retribution grants acid resistance, and is fully indestructible like The Sword of Annihilation; this includes falling off if a character polymorphs into a large monster while wearing it, rather than being destroyed like other body armor. While worn, the Armor of Retribution grants disintegration resistance, extrinsic protection, half physical damage, half spell damage, increases current carrying capacity by 200 aum and maximum carrying capacity by 500 aum, and has a 1⁄7 chance of knocking back monsters that attack the wearer in melee.

The Armor of Retribution cannot be made into dragon-scaled armor using worn dragon scales.

Encyclopedia entry

Legend tells of a suit of armor that protects the one that
wears it like no other. So intent in its mission to safeguard
its master, it will actively attack those that try to harm it.
